content: slip st in each chain to next marked chain *chain 13 pm chain 48 pm chain 13 slip st in next marked st chain 41 slip st in next marked st on next large loop repeat from * around for spiderweb 50 / 127 cm in diameter last round at the end of the previous round cut the thread and hide it inside take the thread and dial 6 chain leaving a long tail to attach the spider web slip st in the second marked st on the first loop 47 chain slip st in the first marked st on next large loop 6 chain finish off leaving a long tail *6 chain leaving a long tail slip st in the next marked st 47 chain slip st in the first marked st on next large loop 6 chain finish off leaving a long tail repeat from * around for a larger web after 10 round continue to crochet 11 round and after -
